gurmukhi: ੴ> ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ||
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ੧ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਾਂ ਦੇ ਲੱਛਣ
transliteration: Ikonkaar Satigur Prasaadi ?
translation: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹੋਵੈ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਹੋਰਤੁ ਸੰਗਿ ਕੁਸੰਗਿ ਨ ਰਚੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Hovai Saadhasangu Horatu Sangi Kousangi N Rachai.
translation: The person having attained the status of Gurmukh in the holy  congregation does not mix up with any bad company.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥੁ ਸੁਹੇਲੜਾ ਬਾਰਹ ਪੰਥ ਨ ਖੇਚਲ ਖਚੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Pandu Suhaylarhaa Baarah Pand N Khaychal Khachai.
translation: The way (life) of  Gurmukh is simple and enjoyable; he does not enrapt himself with the  concerns of the twelve sects (of yogis).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਵਰਨ ਅਵਰਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਰੰਗ ਸੁਰੰਗੁ ਤੰਬੋਲ ਪਰਚੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Varan Avaran Hoi Rang Surangu Tanbol Parachai.
translation: Gurmukhs go beyond the castes,  colours and go about in equanimity like the red colour of betel leaf.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਦਰਸਨੁ ਦੇਖਣਾ ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨ ਪਰਸਣ ਨ ਸਰਚੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Darasanu Daykhanaa Chhia Darasan Parasan N Sarachai.
translation: Gurmukhs behold the Guru's school and put no faith in six Schools (of  Indian tradition).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਮਤਿ ਹੈ ਦੂਜੇ ਭਾੲਿ ਲੁਭਾੲਿ ਨ ਪਚੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Nihachal Mati Hai Doojay Bhaai Loubhaai N Pachai.
translation: Gurmukhs have steadfast wisdom and do not waste  themselves in the fire of duality.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦੁ ਕਮਾਵਣਾ ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਰਹਰਾਸਿ ਨ ਹਚੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sabadu Kamaavanaa Pairee Pai Raharaasi N Hachai.
translation: Gurmukhs practise the (Guru) shabad and  never forsake the exercise of touching the feet, i.e.they never abandon  humility.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਭਾੲਿ ਭਗਤਿ ਚਹਮਚੈ ||੧||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Bhaai Bhagati Chahamachai ?1?
translation: Gurmukhs abound in loving devotion.

gurmukhi: ੨ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਾਂ ਦੇ ਲੱਛਣ
translation: Attributes of Gurmukhs-the Guru oriented

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ੲਿਕੁ ਅਰਾਧਣਾ ੲਿਕੁ ਮਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਨ ਹੋੲਿ ਦੁਚਿਤਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Iku Araadhanaa Iku Man Hoi N Hoi Douchitaa.
translation: The Gurmukhs single-mindedly adore the Lord and do not remain in  dubiety.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿਅਾ ਜੀਵਨੁ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਨ ਤਾਮਸ ਪਿਤਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Aapu Gavaaiaa Jeevanu Moukati N Taamas Pitaa.
translation: By leaving away ego they become liberated and do not allow the  darkness (ignorance) to reside in their heart.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ ਅਵੇਸ ਕਰਿ ਸਣੁ ਦੂਤਾ ਵਿਖੜਾ ਗੜੁ ਜਿਤਾ
transliteration: Gur Oupadaysu Avaysu Kari Sanu Dootaa Vikharhaa Garhu Jitaa.
translation: Wrapt in the teachings of the  Guru, they conquer the fort (of body) including the five evils.

gurmukhi: ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਪਾਖਾਕੁ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਾਹੁਨੜਾ ਜਗਿ ਹੋੲਿ ਅਥਿਤਾ
transliteration: Pairee Pai Paa Khaaku Hoi Paahounarhaa Jagi Hoi Aditaa.
translation: They fall at  the feet, become like dust (i.e.lowly), consider themselves as guests in  the world and are respected by the world.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੇਵਾ ਗੁਰਸਿਖਾ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਮਾ ਪਿੳੁ ਭਾੲੀ ਮਿਤਾ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Sayvaa Gur Sikhaa Gurasikh Maa Piu Bhaaee Mitaa.
translation: Gurmukhs serve the Sikhs  considering them their parents, brothers and friends.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਦੂਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਮਨੁ ਸਿਤਾ
transliteration: Duramati Doubidhaa Doori Kari Guramati Sabad Surati Manu Sitaa.
translation: Having given up  illwill and dubiousness, they merge their consciousness in the Word and  teachings of Guru.

gurmukhi: ਛਡਿ ਕੁਫਕੜੁ ਕੂੜੁ ਕੁਧਿਤਾ ||੨||
transliteration: Chhadi Kudhakarhu Koorhu Kudhitaa ?2?
translation: They set aside frivolous argument, falsehood and bad  deeds.

gurmukhi: ੩ ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਸਹਿਚਾਰੀਅਾਂ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: Companions of Gurmukhs

gurmukhi: ਅਪਣੇ ਅਪਣੇ ਵਰਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨ ਕੁਲ ਧਰਮ ਧਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Aapanay Apanay Varan Vichi Chaari Varan Kul Dharam Dharanday.
translation: In their own varnas all the people (of the four varnas) observe the tradition  of their caste and tribe.

gurmukhi: ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨ ਛਿਅ ਸਾਸਤ੍ਰਾ ਗੁਰ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਖਟੁ ਕਰਮ ਕਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Chhia Darasan Chhia Saasatraa Gur Guramati Khatu Karam Karanday.
translation: The believers in the books of the six schools  perform six duties according to the wisdom of their respective spiritual  mentors.

gurmukhi: ਅਪਣੇ ਅਪਣੇ ਸਾਹਿਬੈ ਚਾਕਰ ਜਾੲਿ ਜੁਹਾਰ ਜੁੜੰਦੇ
transliteration: Apanay Apanay Saahibai Chaakar Jaai Juhaar Jurhanday.
translation: Servants go and salute their masters.

gurmukhi: ਅਪਣੇ ਅਪਣੇ ਵਣਜ ਵਿਚਿ ਵਾਪਾਰੀ ਵਾਪਾਰ ਮਚੰਦੇ
transliteration: Apanay Apanay Vanaj Vichi Vaapaaree Vaapaar Machanday.
translation: Merchants deal profusely  in their own special merchandise.

gurmukhi: ਅਪਣੇ ਅਪਣੇ ਖੇਤ ਵਿਚਿ ਬੀੳੁ ਸਭੈ ਕਿਰਸਾਣਿ ਬੀਜੰਦੇ
transliteration: Apanay Apanay Khayt Vichi Beeu Sabhai Kirasaani Beejanday.
translation: All the farmers sow different seeds in  their different fields.

gurmukhi: ਕਾਰੀਗਰਿ ਕਾਰੀਗਰਾ ਕਾਰਿਖਾਨੇ ਵਿਚਿ ਜਾੲਿ ਮਿਲੰਦੇ
transliteration: Kaareegari Kaareegaraa Kaarikhaanay Vichi Jaai Miladay.
translation: Mechanics meet their fellow mechanics in the  workshop.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਪੁਜੰਦੇ ||੩||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gurasikh Pujanday ?3?
translation: Similarly, the Sikhs of Guru, associate themselves with the  company of the holy persons.

gurmukhi: ੪ ਸਹਿਚਾਰੀਅਾਂ ਦਾ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਤ
translation: Example of the companions

gurmukhi: ਅਮਲੀ ਰਚਨਿ ਅਮਲੀਅਾ ਸੋਫੀ ਸੋਫੀ ਮੇਲੁ ਕਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Amalee Rachani Amaleeaa Sodhee Sodhee Maylu Karanday.
translation: The addicts mix-up with addicts and abstainers with the abstainers.

gurmukhi: ਜੂਅਾਰੀ ਜੂਅਾਰੀਅਾ ਵੇਕਰਮੀ ਵੇਕਰਮ ਰਚੰਦੇ
transliteration: Jooaaree Jooaareeaa Vaykaramee Vaykaram Rachanday.
translation: The  gamblers mix up with gamblers and scounderls with scounderls.

gurmukhi: ਚੋਰਾ ਚੋਰਾ ਪਿਰਹੜੀ ਠਗ ਠਗ ਮਿਲਿ ਦੇਸ ਠਗੰਦੇ
transliteration: Choraa Choraa Piraharhee Tdag Tdag Mili Days Tdaganday.
translation: The love  abounds among the theives and the cheats who getting together, dupe the  country.

gurmukhi: ਮਸਕਰਿਅਾ ਮਿਲਿ ਮਸਕਰੇ ਚੁਗਲਾ ਚੁਗਲ ੳੁਮਾਹਿ ਮਿਲੰਦੇ
transliteration: Masakariaa Mili Masakaray Chougalaa Chougal Oumaahi Miladay.
translation: Jesters meet jesters enthusiastically and so do the backbiters.

gurmukhi: ਮਨਤਾਰੂ ਮਨਤਾਰੂਅਾ ਤਾਰੂ ਤਾਰੂ ਤਾਰ ਤਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Manataaroo Manataarooaan Taaroo Taaroo Taar Taranday.
translation: Unknown to swimming meet similar persons and swimmers by meeting  swimmers go and get across.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਖਿਅਾਰੇ ਦੁਖਿਅਾਰਿਅਾਂ ਮਿਲਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਅਪਣੇ ਦੁਖ ਰੁਵੰਦੇ
transliteration: Doukhiaaray Doukhiaariaan Mili Mili Apanay Doukh Ruvanday.
translation: The afflicted meet the afflicted ones and  share their sufferings.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰਸਿਖੁ ਵਸੰਦੇ ||੪||
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gurasikhu Vasanday ?4?
translation: Likewise, the Sikhs of the Guru feel pleasure in the  holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੫ ਹੋਰ ਸ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟੀ ਤੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਾਂ ਦਾ ਫਰਕ
translation: Difference between Gurmukh and others

gurmukhi: ਕੋੲੀ ਪੰਡਿਤੁ ਜੋਤਿਕੀ ਕੋ ਪਾਧਾ ਕੋ ਵੈਦੁ ਸਦਾੲੇ
transliteration: Koee Panditu Jotikee Ko Paadhaa Ko Vaidu Sadaaay.
translation: Someone is called pandit, someone astrologer, someone priest and some  physician.

gurmukhi: ਕੋੲੀ ਰਾਜਾ ਰਾੳੁ ਕੋ ਕੋ ਮਹਤਾ ਚੳੁਧਰੀ ਅਖਾੲੇ
transliteration: Koee Raajaa Raau Ko Ko Mahataa Chaudharee Akhaaay.
translation: Someone is called the king, satrap, headman and chaudhary.

gurmukhi: ਕੋੲੀ ਬਜਾਜੁ ਸਰਾਫੁ ਕੋ ਕੋ ਜੳੁਹਰੀ ਜੜਾੳੁ ਜੜਾੲੇ
transliteration: Koee Bajaaju Saraaphu Ko Ko Jauharee Jarhaau Jarhaaay.
translation: Someone is draper, someone is called goldsmith and someone a jeweller.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਸਾਰੀ ਪਰਚੂਨੀਅਾ ਕੋੲੀ ਦਲਾਲੀ ਕਿਰਸਿ ਕਮਾੲੇ
transliteration: Paasaaree Parachooneeaa Koee Dalaalee Kirasi Kamaaay.
translation: Someone is earning through being druggist, retailer and an agent.

gurmukhi: ਜਾਤਿ ਸਨਾਤ ਸਹੰਸ ਲਖ ਕਿਰਤ ਵਿਰਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਨਾੳੁ ਗਣਾੲੇ
transliteration: Jaati Sanaat Sahans Lakh Kirati Virati Kari Naau Ganaaay.
translation: (So  called) Low born are millions whose names explain their professions.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰਸਿਖਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਅਾਸਾ ਵਿਚਿ ਨਿਰਾਸੁ ਵਲਾੲੇ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gurasikhi Mili Aasaa Vichi Niraasu Valaaay.
translation: The  Sikh of the Guru, being in the holy congregation, while living in joys  remains indifferent to desires.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਅਲਖੁ ਲਖਾੲੇ ||੫||
transliteration: Sabadu Surati Liv Alakhu Lakhaaay ?5?
translation: He by merging his consciousness in the  Word (sabad) beholds the Supreme Lord.

gurmukhi: ੬ ਹੋਰ ਸ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟੀ ਤੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਾਂ ਦਾ ਫਰਕ
translation: Difference between Gurmukh and others

gurmukhi: ਜਤੀ ਸਤੀ ਚਿਰੁ ਜੀਵਣੇ ਸਾਧਿਕ ਸਿਧ ਨਾਥ ਗੁਰ ਚੇਲੇ
transliteration: Jatee Satee Chiru Jeevanay Saadhik Sidh Naad Gur Chaylay.
translation: Many are the celebates, the abiders of truth, the immortal ones, the siddhs,  nathas, and the teachers and the taughts.

gurmukhi: ਦੇਵੀ ਦੇਵ ਰਿਖੀਸੁਰਾ ਭੈਰੳੁ ਖੇਤ੍ਰਪਾਲ ਬਹੁ ਮੇਲੇ
transliteration: Dayvee Dayv Rikheesuraa Bhairau Khaytrapaal Bahu Maylay.
translation: Many are the goodesses, gods, rsis, bhairavs and the protectors of the regions.

gurmukhi: ਗਣ ਗੰਧਰਬ ਅਪਛਰਾ ਕਿੰਨਰ ਜਛ ਚਲਿਤ ਬਹੁ ਖੇਲੇ
transliteration: Gan Gandharab Apachharaa Kinnar Jachh Chalit Bahu Khaylay.
translation: Many are the gans  (ghosts), gandharvs (celestial singers), nymphs, and kinnars who perform  differently.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਖਸ ਦਾਨੋਂ ਦੈਤ ਲਖ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਦੂਜਾ ਭਾੳੁ ਦੁਹੇਲੇ
transliteration: Raakhas Daanon Dait Lakh Andari Doojaa Bhaau Duhaylay.
translation: Imbued with duality, many are the raksasas, the demons and  the giants.

gurmukhi: ਹੳੁਮੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਭ ਕੋ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਰਸ ਕੇਲੇ
transliteration: Haoumai Andari Sabh Ko Guramoukhi Saadhasangati Ras Kaylay.
translation: All are controlled by the ego and the Gurmukhs take pleasure  in the holy congregation.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕ ਮਨ ੲਿਕੁ ਅਰਾਧਣਾ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿ ਸੁਹੇਲੇ
transliteration: Ik Man Iku Araadhanaa Guramati Aapu Gavaai Suhaylay.
translation: There they, accepting the Guru's wisdom, shed  away their selfhood.

gurmukhi: ਚਲਣੁ ਜਾਣ ਪੲੇ ਸਿਰਿ ਤੇਲੇ ||੬||
transliteration: Chalanu Jaani Paay Siri Taylay ?6?
translation: (In India while going to get married the girl applies  oil to her hair and understands well that now she is going to leave her  parental home) Similarly Gurmukhs always having oil applied to their  heads are ever ready to depart from this world.

gurmukhi: ੭ ਜਗਤ ਦੇ ਰੁਝੇਵੇਂ ਤੇ ਗੁਰ ਸ਼ਬਦ
translation: The obsessions with the world and the Guru word

gurmukhi: ਜਤ ਸਤ ਸੰਜਮ ਹੋਮ ਜਗ ਜਪੁ ਤਪੁ ਦਾਨ ਪੁੰਨ ਬਹੁਤੇਰੇ
transliteration: Jad Sat Sanjam Hom Jag Japu Tapu Daan Pounn Bahoutayray.
translation: Hypocrisy by and large enters into the praxis of continence, burnt offerings, feasts, penances and gifts.

gurmukhi: ਰਿਧਿ ਸਿਧਿ ਨਿਧਿ ਪਾਖੰਡ ਬਹੁ ਤੰਤ੍ਰ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਨਾਟਕ ਅਗਲੇਰੇ
transliteration: Ridhi Sidhi Nidhi Paakhand Bahu Tantr Mantr Naatak Agalayray.
translation: Incantations and spells ultimately  turn out to be hypocritical plays.

gurmukhi: ਵੀਰਾਰਾਧਣ ਜੋਗਣੀ ਮੜ੍ਹੀ ਮਸਾਣ ਵਿਡਾਣ ਘਨੇਰੇ
transliteration: Veeraaraadhan Joganee Marhhee Masaan Vidaan Ghanayray.
translation: The worship of the fifty-two heroes, of the eight yoginis of cemeteries and of places of cremation leads to  whopping dissimulation.

gurmukhi: ਪੂਰਕ ਕੁੰਭਕ ਰੇਚਕਾ ਨਿਵਲੀ ਕਰਮ ਭੁੲਿਅੰਗਮ ਘੇਰੇ
transliteration: Poorak Kounbhak Raychakaa Nivalee Karam Bhuiangam Ghayray.
translation: People are obsessed with the pranayam exercises of the inhalation, suspension of breath, the exhalation, the niolr feat and  straightening of kundalini the serpent power.

gurmukhi: ਸਿਧਾਸਣ ਪਰਚੇ ਘਣੇ ਹਠ ਨਿਗ੍ਹ ਕੳੁਤਕ ਲਖ ਹੇਰੇ
transliteration: Sidhaasan Parachay Ghanay Hatd Nigrah Kaoutak Lakh Hayray.
translation: Many employ themselves in  sitting in the siddhasanas and thus we have seen them seeking myriad miracles.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਰਸ ਮਣੀ ਰਸਾੲਿਣਾ ਕਰਾਮਾਤ ਕਾਲਖ ਅਾਨ੍ਹੇਰੇ
transliteration: Paaras Manee Rasaainaa Karaamaat Kaalakh Aanhayray.
translation: The belief in the philospher's stone, the jewel in the serpent's  head and the miracle of life immortalising elixir are nothing but the  darkness of ignorance.

gurmukhi: ਪੂਜਾ ਵਰਤ ੳੁਪਾਰਣੇ ਵਰ ਸਰਾਪ ਸਿਵ ਸਕਤਿ ਲਵੇਰੇ
transliteration: Poojaa Varat Oupaaranay Var Saraap Siv Sakati Lavayray.
translation: People are engaged in the worship of idols of gods  and goddesses, in fasting, uttering and giving blessings and curses.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਵਿਣੁ ਥਾੳੁ ਨ ਪਾੲਿਨਿ ਭਲੇ ਭਲੇਰੇ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gur Sabad Vinu Daau N Paaini Bhalay Bhalayray.
translation: But  without the holy congregation of the saints and the recitation of the Guru- sabad even the very good person cannot find acceptance.

gurmukhi: ਕੂੜ ੲਿਕ ਗੰਢੀ ਸੳੁ ਫੇਰੇ ||੭||
transliteration: Koorh Ik Ganddhee Sau Dhayray ?7?
translation: The  superstitions bind themselves with a hundred knots of falsehood.

gurmukhi: ੮ ਸੳੁਣ ਸ਼ਗਨ ਤੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਤਾ
translation: Good and bad omens and the Gurmukh

gurmukhi: ਸੳੁਣ ਸਗੁਨ ਵੀਚਾਰਣੇ ਨੳੁ ਗ੍ਹਿ ਬਾਰਹ ਰਾਸ ਵੀਚਾਰਾ
transliteration: Saoun Sagoun Veechaaranay Nau Grih Baarah Raasi Veechaaraa.
translation: The life led in the light of omens, the nine planets, the twelve signs of the  zodiac;

gurmukhi: ਕਾਮਣ ਟੂਣੇ ਅੳੁਸੀਅਾ ਕਣਸੋੲੀ ਪਾਸਾਰ ਪਸਾਰਾ
transliteration: Kaaman Toonay Aouseeaa Kanasoee Paasaar Pasaaraa.
translation: Incantations, magic divination by lines and by the voice is all  futile.

gurmukhi: ਗਦਹੁ ਕੁਤੇ ਬਿਲੀਅਾ ੲਿਲ ਮਲਾਲੀ ਗਿਦੜ ਛਾਰਾ
transliteration: Gadahu Koutay Bileeaa Il Malaalee Gidarh Chhaaraa.
translation: Cries of donkeys, dogs, cats, kites, blackbirds and jackals cannot  control our lives.

gurmukhi: ਨਾਰਿ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਪਾਣੀ ਅਗਨਿ ਛਿਕ ਪਦ ਹਿਡਕੀ ਵਰਤਾਰਾ
transliteration: Naari Purakhu Paanee Agani Chhik Pad Hidakee Varataaraa.
translation: It is superstitious to draw good or bad omens from  meeting a widow, a bare headed man, water, fire, sneezing, breaking wind,  hiccups;.

gurmukhi: ਥਿਤਿ ਵਾਰ ਭਦ੍ਰਾ ਭਰਮ ਦਿਸਾਸੂਲ ਸਹਸਾ ਸੈਸਾਰਾ
transliteration: Diti Vaar Bhadraa Bharam Disaa Sool Sahasaa Saisaaraa.
translation: Lunar and week days, lucky-unlucky moments and going or not  going in a particular direction

gurmukhi: ਵਲ ਛਲ ਕਰਿ ਵਿਸਵਾਸ ਲਖ ਬਹੁ ਚੁਖੀ ਕਿੳੁ ਰਵੈ ਭਤਾਰਾ
transliteration: Valachhal Kari Visavaas Lakh Bahu Choukhee Kiu Ravai Bhataaraa.
translation: If a women behaves like a prostitute and  does every thing to please everybody, how can she be loved by her  husband.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲ ਪਾਰ ੳੁਤਾਰਾ ||੮||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Paar Outaaraa ?8?
translation: The gurmukhs who reject all superstitions enjoy happiness with  their Lord and get across the world-ocean.

gurmukhi: ੯ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਮਾਰਗ ਦੀ ਪਾਵਨਤਾ
translation: Holiness of the Gurmukh way of life

gurmukhi: ਨਦੀਅਾ ਨਾਲੇ ਵਾਹੜੇ ਗੰਗਿ ਸੰਗਿ ਗੰਗੋਦਕ ਹੋੲੀ
transliteration: Nadeeaa Naalay Vaaharhay Gangi Sangi Gangodak Hoee.
translation: Rivers and small streams joining Ganges become the sacred river  (Ganges).

gurmukhi: ਅਸਟ ਧਾਤੁ ੲਿਕ ਧਾਤ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਾਰਸ ਪਰਸੈ ਕੰਚਨੁ ਸੋੲੀ
transliteration: Asat Dhaatu Ik Dhaatu Hoi Paaras Parasai Kanchanu Soee.
translation: With the touch of the philosopher's stone (paras) all the mixed  light metals are transformed into gold.

gurmukhi: ਚੰਦਨ ਵਾਸੁ ਵਣਾਸਪਤਿ ਅਫਲ ਸਫਲ ਕਰ ਚੰਦਨੁ ਗੋੲੀ
transliteration: Chandan Vaasu Vanaasapati Aphal Saphal Kar Chandanu Goee.
translation: The vegetation whether fruit producing or fruitless becomes sandal by assimilating into it the fragrance  of sandal.

gurmukhi: ਛਿਅ ਰੁਤਿ ਬਾਰਹ ਮਾਹ ਕਰਿ ਸੁਝੈ ਸੁਝ ਨ ਦੂਜਾ ਕੋੲੀ
transliteration: Chhia Routi Baarah Maah Kari Sujhai Sujh N Doojaa Koee.
translation: In the six seasons and twelve months nothing except sun is  there.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰਿ ਵਰਨਿ ਛਿਅ ਦਰਸਨਾ ਬਾਰਹ ਵਾਟ ਭਵੈ ਸਭੁ ਲੋੲੀ
transliteration: Chaari Varani Chhia Darasanaa Baarah Vaat Bhavai Sabhu Loee.
translation: Four varnas, six Schools of philosophy and twelve sects of the  yogis are there in this world.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਦਰਸਨੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਾਰਗਿ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਖੋੲੀ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Darasanu Saadhasangu Guramoukhi Maaragi Doubidhaa Khoee.
translation: But by treading the path of Gurmukhs all the dubieties of the above sects vanish.

gurmukhi: ੲਿਕ ਮਨਿ ੲਿਕ ਅਰਾਧਨਿ ਓੲੀ ||੯||
transliteration: Ik Mani Iku Araadhani Aoee ?9?
translation: They (Gurmukhs) now with stable  mind adore the One (Lord).

gurmukhi: ੧੦ ਕੁਲਾਧਰਮ ਤੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਮਾਰਗ
translation: Family customs and the way of Gurmukh

gurmukhi: ਨਾਨਕ ਦਾਦਕ ਸਾਹੁਰੈ ਵਿਰਤੀਸੁਰ ਲਾਗਾੲਿਤ ਹੋੲੇ
transliteration: Naanak Daadak Saahurai Virateesur Lagaait Hoay.
translation: In the house of maternal grandfather, the father-in-law and the  grandfather, many a priest and servant exist.

gurmukhi: ਜੰਮਣਿ ਭਦਣਿ ਮੰਗਣੈ ਮਰਣੈ ਪਰਣੇ ਕਰਦੇ ਢੋੲੇ
transliteration: Janmani Bhadani Manganai Maranai Paranay Karaday Ddhoay.
translation: They carry the messages on  births, the mundan (shaving of head) ceremonies, betrothals, marriages and  deaths

gurmukhi: ਰੀਤੀ ਰੂੜੀ ਕੁਲ ਧਰਮ ਚਜ ਅਚਾਰ ਵੀਚਾਰ ਵਿਖੋੲੇ
transliteration: Reetee Roorhee Kul Dharam Chaju Achaar Veechaar Vikhoay.
translation: They are seen working for the family duties and customs.

gurmukhi: ਕਰਿ ਕਰਤੂਤਿ ਕਸੂਤ ਵਿਚਿ ਪਾੲਿ ਦੁਲੀਚੇ ਗੈਣ ਚੰਦੋੲੇ
transliteration: Kari Karatooti Kousoot Vichi Paai Duleechay Gain Chandoay.
translation: On  occasions such as the sacred thread ceremonies, they through many tricks  make the master spend lavishly and tell him about his fame reaching the  skies.

gurmukhi: ਜੋਧ ਜਠੇਰੇ ਮੰਨੀਅਨਿ ਸਤੀਅਾ ਸੳੁਤ ਟੋਭੜੀ ਟੋੲੇ
transliteration: Jodh Jatdayray Manneeani Sateeaan Saout Tobharhee Toay.
translation: Deluded by them people worship departed heroes, ancestors, satis,  deceased co-wives, tanks and pits, but all this is of no avail.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਵਿਣੁ ਮਰਿ ਮਰਿ ਜੰਮਨਿ ਦੲੀ ਵਿਗੋੲੇ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gur Sabad Vinu Mari Mari Janmani Daee Vigoay.
translation: They who  enjoy not the holy congregation and the word of Guru, die and are born  again and are rejected of God.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹੀਰੇ ਹਾਰਿ ਪਰੋੲੇ ||੧੦||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Heeray Haari Paroay ?10?
translation: It is the follower of the Guru, i.e. Gurmukh  who wears (God's name as his) diamond necklace.

gurmukhi: ੧੧ ਸ਼ਾਹਜ਼ਾਦੇ ਰਾਜ ਕੰਵਰ
translation: Princes

gurmukhi: ਲਸਕਰ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਲਾਡੁਲੇ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹਾ ਜਾੲੇ ਸਾਹਜਾਦੇ
transliteration: Lasakar Andari Laadulay Paatisaahaa Jaaay Saahajaaday.
translation: In the armies of emperors the dear princes also move.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹ ਅਗੈ ਚੜਨਿ ਪਿਛੈ ਸਭ ੳੁਮਰਾੳੁ ਪਿਅਾਦੇ
transliteration: Paatisaah Agai Charhani Pichhai Sabh Oumaraau Piaaday.
translation: The emperor leads  and the satraps and infantry follow.

gurmukhi: ਬਣਿ ਬਣਿ ਅਾਵਨਿ ਤਾੲਿਫੇ ਓੲਿ ਸਹਜਾਦੇ ਸਾਦ ਮੁਰਾਦੇ
transliteration: Bani Bani Aavani Taaidhay Aoi Sahajaaday Saad Muraaday.
translation: The courtesans well-dressed come  before all but the princes remain simple and straight.

gurmukhi: ਖਿਜਮਤਿਗਾਰ ਵਡੀਰੀਅਨਿ ਦਰਗਹ ਹੋਨਿ ਖੁਅਾਰ ਕੁਵਾਦੇ
transliteration: Khijamatigaar Vadeereeani Daragah Honi Khuaar Kuvaaday.
translation: The (true) servants  of the kings earn applause but the defiants get humiliated in the court.

gurmukhi: ਅੱਗੈ ਢੋੲੀ ਸੇ ਲਹਨਿ ਸੇਵਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਕਾਰ ਕੁਸਾਦੇ
transliteration: Agai Ddhoee Say Lahani Sayvaa Andari Kaar Kousaaday.
translation: In  the court (of the Lord) only they get shelter who remain rapt (in the  service).

gurmukhi: ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹਾਂ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਸੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਵਰਤੈ ਗੁਰ ਪਰਸਾਦੇ
transliteration: Paatisaahaan Patisaahu So Guramoukhi Varatai Gur Parasaaday.
translation: With grace of the Lord, such gurmukhs become king of kings.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਹ ਸੁਹੇਲੇ ਅਾਦਿ ਜੁਗਾਦੇ ||੧੧||
transliteration: Saah Suhaylay Aadi Jougaaday ?11?
translation: Only such people ever remain happy and contented.

gurmukhi: ੧੨ ਹੋਰ ਦ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਟਾਂਤ
translation: More examples

gurmukhi: ਤਾਰੇ ਲਖ ਅਨ੍ਹੇਰ ਵਿਚਿ ਚੜ੍ਹਿਅੈ ਸੁਝਿ ਨ ਸੁਝੈ ਕੋੲੀ
transliteration: Taaray Lakh Anhayr Vichi Charhhiai Sujhi N Sujhai Koee.
translation: Myraid stars exist in the darkness but with the rise of the sun no one  remains visible.

gurmukhi: ਸੀਹਿ ਬੁਕੇ ਮਿਰਗਾਵਲੀ ਭੰਨੀ ਜਾੲਿ ਨ ਅਾੲਿ ਖੜੋੲੀ
transliteration: Seehi Boukay Miragaavalee Bhannee Jaai N Aai Kharhoee.
translation: Before the roar of the lion, flocks of deers take to their  heels.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਸੀਅਰ ਗਰੜੈ ਡਿਠਿਅਾ ਖੁਡੀ ਵੜਿਦੇ ਲਖ ਪਲੋੲੀ
transliteration: Biseear Gararhai Ditdiaa Khudee Varhiday Lakh Paloee.
translation: Seeing the large vulture (garur) the snakes crawl into their holes.

gurmukhi: ਪੰਖੇਰੂ ਸਾਹਬਾਜ ਦੇਖਿ ਢੁਕਿ ਨ ਹੰਘਨਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਨ ਢੋੲੀ
transliteration: Pankhayroo Saahabaaj Daykhi Ddhouki N Hanghani Milai N Ddhoee.
translation: Seeing a hawk, the birds fly helter skelter and do not find place to hide.

gurmukhi: ਚਾਰ ਵੀਚਾਰ ਸੰਸਾਰ ਵਿਚਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਖੋੲੀ
transliteration: Chaar Veechaar Sansaar Vichi Saadhasangati Mili Duramati Khoee.
translation: In  this world of conduct and thought, in the holy congregation one gives up  evil-mindedness.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਚਾ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਮਾਰਿ ਮਵਾਸਾ ਗੋੲੀ
transliteration: Satigur Sachaa Paatisaahu Doubidhaa Maari Mavaasaa Goee.
translation: The true Guru is the true king who obliterates dilemma,  and, evil propensities hide or vanish.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਜਾਤਾ ਜਾਣੁ ਜਣੋੲੀ ||੧੨||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Jaataa Jaanu Janoee ?12?
translation: The Gurmukhs diffuse their  knowledge among others (and they are not selfish people).

gurmukhi: ੧੩ ਗਾਡੀ ਰਾਹ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਮਾਰਗ
translation: The Sikh highway-gadirah

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਚਾ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਗਾਡੀ ਰਾਹੁ ਚਲਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Satigur Sachaa Paatisaahu Guramoukhi Gaadee Raahu Chalaaiaa.
translation: The true Guru, the real emperor has put the Guru-oriented (gurmukh) on  the high road ( of liberation).

gurmukhi: ਪੰਜਿ ਦੂਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਭੂਤ ਵਸਿ ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਦੂਜਾ ਭਾੳੁ ਮਿਟਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Panji Dooti Kari Bhoot Vasi Duramati Doojaa Bhaau Mitaaiaa.
translation: He restrains the deadly sins, the five evil  inclinations and the sense of duality.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਚਲਣਾ ਜਮੁ ਜਾਗਾਤੀ ਨੇੜਿ ਨ ਅਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Livi Chalanaa Jamu Jaagaatee Nayrhi N Aaiaa.
translation: Gurmukhs spend their lives while  keeping their heart and mind attuned with the sabda (word) and therefore  death, the tax-gatherer does not approach them.

gurmukhi: ਬੇਮੁਖ ਬਾਰਹ ਵਾਟ ਕਰਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚੁ ਖੰਡੁ ਵਸਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Baymoukhi Baarah Vaat Kari Saadhasangati Sachu Khandu Vasaaiaa.
translation: The Guru had dispersed the apostates into the twelve sects (of the yogis), and seated the holy  congregation of the saints in the domain of Truth (the sachkhand).

gurmukhi: ਭਾੳੁ ਭਗਤਿ ਭੳੁ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਦੇ ਨਾਮੁ ਦਾਨੁ ੲਿਸਨਾਨੁ ਦ੍ਰਿੜਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Bhaau Bhagati Bhau Mantr Day Naamu Daanu Isanaanu Drirhaaiaa.
translation: By the  spell of the Nam, the gurumukhs have inculcated love, devotion, fear,  charity and ablutions.

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਜਲ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਕਮਲ ਹੈ ਮਾੲਿਅਾ ਵਿਚਿ ੳੁਦਾਸੁ ਰਹਾੲਿਅਾ
transliteration: Jiu Jal Andari Kamal Hai Maaiaa Vichi Udaasu Rahaaiaa.
translation: The gurmukhs keep themselves unaffected by the  evils of the world as the lotus remains unwet in water.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿ ਨ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਣਾੲਿਅਾ ||੧੩||
transliteration: Aapu Gavaai N Aapu Ganaaiaa ?13?
translation: Gurmukhs efface  their individuality and do not pose to assert themselves.

gurmukhi: ੧੪ ਸਚਾ ਸੋਹਿਲਾ
translation: The true engagement

gurmukhi: ਰਾਜਾ ਪਰਜਾ ਹੋੲਿਕੈ ਚਾਕਰ ਕੂਕਰ ਦੇਸਿ ਦੁਹਾੲੀ
transliteration: Raajaa Parajaa Hoi Kai Chaakar Kookar Daysi Duhaaee.
translation: By becoming subject of a king, people as servants go around the countries  to abide orders.

gurmukhi: ਜੰਮਦਿਅਾ ਰੁਣਿਝੁੰਝਣਾ ਨਾਨਕ ਦਾਦਕ ਹੋੲਿ ਵਧਾੲੀ
transliteration: Janmadiaa Rounijhounjhanaa Naanak Daadak Hoi Vadhaaee.
translation: On the birth of a child felicitatory songs are sung in the houses of the maternal and paternal grandfathers.

gurmukhi: ਵੀਵਾਹਾ ਨੋ ਸਿਠਣੀਅਾ ਦੁਹੀ ਵਲੀ ਦੁਹਿ ਤੂਰ ਵਜਾੲੀ
transliteration: Veevaahaa No Sitdaneeaa Duhee Valee Dui Toor Vajaaee.
translation: On marriage occasions  the songs are sung by woman in scurrilous language and trumpets are  played on the part of the bride and bridegroom (but not so among the  gurmukhs).

gurmukhi: ਰੋਵਣ ਪਿਟਣੁ ਮੁੲਿਅਾਂ ਨੋ ਵੈਣ ਅਲਾਹਣਿ ਧੁਮ ਧੁਮਾੲੀ
transliteration: Rovanu Pitanu Muiaa No Vainu Alaahani Dhoum Dhoumaaee.
translation: Weepings and wailings are there for the dead;

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਚੁ ਸੋਹਿਲਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਲਾੲੀ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Sachu Sohilaa Guramoukhi Saadhasangati Liv Laaee.
translation: But the  gurmukhs (the Guru-oriented) recite the Sohila in the company of the saints on such occasions.

gurmukhi: ਬੇਦ ਕਤੇਬਹੁ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਜੰਮਣਿ ਮਰਣਿ ਅਲਿਪਤੁ ਰਹਾੲੀ
transliteration: Bayd Kataybahu Baaharaa Janmani Marani Alipatu Rahaaee.
translation: The Sikh (gurmukh) goes beyond the holy books  of the Hindus and Muslims i.e. the Vedas and the Katebas, and neither rejoices at a birth nor mourns at a death.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਸਾ ਵਿਚਿ ਨਿਰਾਸੁ ਵਲਾੲੀ ||੧੪||
transliteration: Aasaa Vichi Niraasu Valaaee ?14?
translation: In the midst of desires he  remains free from them.

gurmukhi: ੧੫ ਗੁਰਮੁਖ ਮਨਮੁਖ
translation: The Guru-oriented

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥੁ ਸੁਹੇਲੜਾ ਮਨਮੁਖ ਬਾਰਹ ਵਾਟ ਫਿਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Pandu Suhaylarhaa Manamoukh Baarah Vaat Dhiranday.
translation: The Guru-oriented move upon the simple and straight way and the mind- oriented (manmukh) go astray on twelve ways (the twelve sects of the  Yogis).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਾਰਿ ਲੰਘਾੲਿਦਾ ਮਨਮੁਖ ਭਵਜਲ ਵਿਚਿ ਡੁਬੰਦੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Paari Laghaaidaa Manamoukh Bhavajal Vichi Doubanday.
translation: The gurmukhs get across whereas the manmukhs get drowned in  the world-ocean.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਜੀਵਨ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਮਨਮੁਖ ਫਿਰਿ ਫਿਰਿ ਜਨਮ ਮਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Jeevan Moukati Kari Manamoukh Dhiri Dhiri Janami Maranday.
translation: The life of gurmukh is the sacred tank of liberation and  the manmukhs go on transmigrating and suffering the pangs of life and  death.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਾੲਿਦੇ ਮਨਮੁਖ ਦੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਦੁਖ ਲਹੰਦੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phalu Paaiday Manamoukhi Doukh Phalu Doukh Lahanday.
translation: The gurmukh is at ease in the court of the Lord but the manmukh  has to bear (pain of) the rod of yama, the god of death.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਦਰਗਹ ਸੁਰਖਰੂ ਮਨਮੁਖਿ ਜਮਪੁਰਿ ਡੰਡ ਸਹੰਦੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Daragah Surakharoo Manamoukhi Jam Puri Dandu Sahanday.
translation: The gurmukh is at ease in the court of the Lord but the manmukh  has to bear (pain of) the rod of yama, the god of death.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿਅਾ ਮਨਮੁਖ ਹੳੁਮੈ ਅਗਨਿ ਜਲੰਦੇ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Aapu Gavaaiaa Manamoukhi Haoumai Agani Jaladay.
translation: The gurmukh  forsakes ego whereas manmukh burns himself continuously in the fire of  egotism.

gurmukhi: ਬੰਦੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਵਿਰਲੇ ਬੰਦੇ ||੧੫||
transliteration: Bandee Andari Viralay Banday ?15?
translation: Rare are the people who though being in the limits (of maya) yet  remain immersed in His meditation.

gurmukhi: ੧੬ ਸੁਹਾਗਣ ਦੇ ਰੂਪਕ ਵਿਚ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ
translation: The woman

gurmukhi: ਪੇਵਕੜੈ ਘਰਿ ਲਾਡੁਲੀ ਮਾੳੂੂ ਪੀੳੂ ਖਰੀ ਪਿਅਾਰੀ
transliteration: Payvakarhai Ghari Laadulee Maaoo Peeoo Kharee Piaaree.
translation: In her mother's home the girl is fondled and dearly loved by parents.

gurmukhi: ਵਿਚਿ ਭਿਰਾਵਾਂ ਭੈਨੜੀ ਨਾਨਕ ਦਾਦਕ ਸਪਰਵਾਰੀ
transliteration: Vichi Bhiraavaan Bhainarhee Naanak Daadak Saparavaaree.
translation: Among the brothers she is a sister and lives joyfully in the full fledged  families of the maternal and the paternal grand fathers.

gurmukhi: ਲਖ ਖਰਚ ਵਿਅਾਹੀਅੈ ਗਹਣੇ ਦਾਜੁ ਸਾਜੁ ਅਤਿ ਭਾਰੀ
transliteration: Lakhaan Kharach Viaaheeai Gahanay Daaju Saaju Ati Bhaaree.
translation: Then offering  ornaments and dowry etc. and by spending lacs of rupees she is married.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਹੁਰੜੈ ਘਰਿ ਮੰਨੀਅੈ ਸਣਖਤੀ ਪਰਵਾਰ ਸਧਾਰੀ
transliteration: Saahurarhai Ghari Manneeai Sanakhatee Paravaar Sadhaaree.
translation: In her father-in-law's house she is accepted as title married wife.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਖ ਮਾਣੈ ਪਿਰੁ ਸੇਜੜੀ ਛਤੀਹ ਭੋਜਨ ਸਦਾ ਸੀਗਾਰੀ
transliteration: Soukh Maanai Piru Sayjarhee Chhateeh Bhojan Sadaa Seegaaree.
translation: She  enjoys with her husband, eats variety of foods and always remains bedecked.

gurmukhi: ਲੋਕ ਵੇਦ ਗੁਣੁ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਅਰਧ ਸਰੀਰੀ ਮੋਖ ਦੁਅਾਰੀ
transliteration: Lok Vayd Gounu Giaan Vichi Aradh Sareeree Mokh Duaaree.
translation: From a temporal and spiritual point of view, women is half  man's body and assists to the door of deliverance.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲ ਨਿਹਚੳੁ ਨਾਰੀ ||੧੬||
transliteration: Guramoukhi Soukh Phal Nihachau Naaree ?16?
translation: She assuredly brings  happiness to the virtuous.

gurmukhi: ੧੭ ਵੇਸ਼ਵਾ ਦੇ ਰੂਪਕ ਵਿਚ ਮਨਮੁਖ
translation: Manmukh,a prostitute

gurmukhi: ਜਿੳੁ ਬਹੁ ਮਿਤੀ ਵੇਸੁਅਾ ਸਭਿ ਕੁਲਖਣ ਪਾਪ ਕਮਾਵੈ
transliteration: Jiu Bahu Mitee Vaysuaa Sabhi Kulakhan Paap Kamaavai
translation: A prostitute having many lovers commits every species of sin.

gurmukhi: ਲੋਕਹੁ ਦੇਸਹੁ ਬਾਹਰੀ ਤਿਹੁ ਪਖਾਂ ਕਾਲੰਕ ਲਗਾਵੈ
transliteration: Lokahu Daysahu Baaharee Tihu Pakhaan No Aulagu Laavai.
translation: An outcast  from her people and her country, she brings disgrace on all the three  sides, i.e. her father's mother's and the family of father-in-law.

gurmukhi: ਡੁਬੀ ਡੋਬੈ ਹੋਰਨਾ ਮਹੁਰਾ ਮਿਠਾ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਚਾਵੈ
transliteration: Doubee Dobai Horanaa Mahuraa Mitdaa Hoi Pachaavai.
translation: Ruined  herself, she ruines others and still goes on gulping and digesting poison.

gurmukhi: ਘੰਡਾ ਹੇੜਾ ਮਿਰਗ ਜਿੳੁ ਦੀਪਕ ਹੋੲਿ ਪਤੰਗ ਜਲਾਵੈ
transliteration: Ghandaa Hayrhaa Mirag Jiu Deepak Hoi Patang Jalaavai.
translation: She is like the musical pipe which lures the deer, or lamp which burns the  moth.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਹੀ ਸਰਾੲੀ ਜਰਦਰੂ ਪਥਰ ਬੇੜੀ ਪੂਰ ਡੁਬਾਵੈ
transliteration: Duhee Saraaee Jaradaroo Padar Bayrhee Poor Doubaavai.
translation: Due to the sinful activities her face in both the worlds remains pale  because she behaves like a boat of stone which drowns its passengers.

gurmukhi: ਮਨਮੁਖ ਮਨੁ ਅਠ ਖੰਡ ਹੋੲਿ ਦੁਸਟਾ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਭਰਮਿ ਭੁਲਾਵੈ
transliteration: Manamoukh Manu Atd Khand Hoi Dousataa Sangati Bharami Bhulaavai.
translation: Similar is the mind of apostate (manmukh), scattered and led astray by superstitions  in the company of evil doers.

gurmukhi: ਵੇਸੁਅਾ ਪੁਤੁ ਨਿਨਾੳੁ ਸਦਾਵੈ ||੧੭||
transliteration: Vaysuaa Poutu Ninaau Sadaavai ?17?
translation: And similar to courtesan's son bearing no  name of his father, the apostate is also not owned by anyone.

gurmukhi: ੧੮ ਬਾਲਕ, ਜੁਬਾ, ਬਿਰਧ ਅਵਸਥਾ
translation: The childhood,the youth and the old age, ,  "

gurmukhi: ਸੁਧਿ ਨ ਹੋਵੈ ਬਾਲ ਬੁਧਿ ਬਾਲਕ ਲੀਲਾ ਵਿਚਿ ਵਿਹਾਵੈ
transliteration: Sudhi N Hovai Baal Budhi Baalak Leelaa Vichi Vihaavai.
translation: Child's wisdom cares not for anything and he passes his time in joyful  activities.

gurmukhi: ਭਰ ਜੋਬਨਿ ਭਰਮਾੲੀਅੈ ਪਰ ਤਨ ਧਨ ਪਰ ਨਿੰਦ ਲੁਭਾਵੈ
transliteration: Bhar Jobani Bharamaaeeai Par Tan Dhan Par Nid Loubhaavai.
translation: In youthful days, he is attracted by other's body, wealth and  backbiting.

gurmukhi: ਬਿਰਧਿ ਹੋਅਾ ਜੰਜਾਲ ਵਿਚਿ ਮਹਾ ਜਾਲ ਪਰਵਾਰੁ ਫਹਾਵੈ
transliteration: Biradhi Hoaa Janjaal Vichi Mahaa Jaalu Paravaaru Dhahaavai.
translation: In old age he is caught in the large web of family affairs.

gurmukhi: ਬਲ ਹੀਣਾ ਮਤਿ ਹੀਣ ਹੋੲਿ ਨਾੳੁ ਬਹਤਰਿਅਾ ਬਰੜਾਵੈ
transliteration: Bal Heenaa Mati Heenu Hoi Naau Bahatariaa Bararhaavai.
translation: Known to be seventy-two he becomes frail and wisdomless and mumbles in sleep.

gurmukhi: ਅੰਨ੍ਹਾ ਬੋਲਾ ਪਿੰਗਲਾ ਤਨੁ ਥਕਾ ਮਨ ਦਹਦਿਸੁ ਧਾਵੈ
transliteration: Annhaa Bolaa Pingalaa Tanu Dakaa Manu Dah Disu Dhaavai.
translation: Ultimately he turns blind, deaf and lame and though the body  gets tired yet his mind runs in ten directions.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰ ਸਬਦ ਵਿਣੁ ਲਖ ਚੳੁਰਾਸੀਹ ਜੂਨਿ ਭਵਾਵੈ
transliteration: Saadhasangati Gur Sabad Vinu Lakh Chauraaseeh Jooni Bhavaavai.
translation: Without holy congregation  and bereft of Guru-word he transmigrates into infinite species of life.

gurmukhi: ਅੳੁਸਰੁ ਚੁਕਾ ਹਥਿ ਨ ਅਾਵੈ ||੧੮||
transliteration: Aousaru Choukaa Hadi N Aavai ?18?
translation: The time lost cannot be regained.

gurmukhi: ੧੯ ਹੰਸ, ਬਗੁਲਾ, ਗੁਰਮੁਖ, ਮਨਮੁਖ
translation: swan,crane,gurmukh,manmukh, , , "

gurmukhi: ਹੰਸ ਨ ਛਡੈ ਮਾਨਸਰ ਬਗੁਲਾ ਬਹੁ ਛਪੜ ਫਿਰਿ ਅਾਵੈ
transliteration: Hansu N Chhadai Maanasar Bagulaa Bahu Chhaparh Dhiri Aavai.
translation: The swan never leaves Manasarovar, the sacred tank, but the crane  always comes to the 4irty pond.

gurmukhi: ਕੋੲਿਲ ਬੋਲੈ ਅੰਬ ਵਣਿ ਵਣਿ ਵਣਿ ਕਾੳੁ ਕੁਥਾੳੁ ਸੁਖਾਵੈ
transliteration: Koil Bolai Anb Vani Vani Vani Kaau Kudaau Soukhaavai.
translation: The nightingale sings in the mango  groves but the crow feels comfort at an abominable place in the forest.

gurmukhi: ਵਗ ਨ ਹੋਵਨਿ ਕੁਤੀਅਾ ਗਾੲੀਂ ਗੋਰਸੁ ਵੰਸੁ ਵਧਾਵੈ
transliteration: Vag N Hovani Kouteeaan Gaaeen Gorasu Vansu Vadhaavai.
translation: The bitches have no groups. (like cows) and the cows only give milk and  increase the lineage.

gurmukhi: ਸਫਲ ਬਿਰਖ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਮਤੀ ਨਿਹਫਲ ਮਾਣਸ ਦਹ ਦਿਸ ਧਾਵੈ
transliteration: Saphal Birakh Nihachal Matee Nihaphal Maanas Dah Disi Dhaavai.
translation: The tree full of fruits is stable at one place whereas a  vain person always runs hither and thither.

gurmukhi: ਅਗ ਤਤੀ ਜਲੁ ਸੀਅਲਾ ਸਿਰੁ ੳੁਚਾ ਨੀਵਾਂ ਦਿਖਲਾਵੈ
transliteration: Agi Tatee Jalu Seealaa Siru Ouchaa Neevaan Dikhalaavai.
translation: The fire is full of heat (of ego) and keeps its head high but the water being cold always goes downward.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਵਾੲਿਅਾ ਮਨਮੁਖੁ ਮੂਰਖਿ ਅਾਪੁ ਗਣਾਵੈ
transliteration: Guramoukhi Aapu Gavaaiaa Manamoukhu Moorakhi Aapu Ganaavai.
translation: Gurmukh divests his soul of the egocenteredness but manmukh, the fool  always counts himself (above all).

gurmukhi: ਦੂਜਾ ਭਾੳੁ ਕੁਦਾੳੁ ਹਰਾਵੈ ||੧੯||
transliteration: Doojaa Bhaau Kudaaoun Haraavai ?19?
translation: Having sense of duality is not a good conduct, and one always is defeated.

gurmukhi: ੨੦ ਪੰਜ ਜੰਤੂਅਾਂ ਦੁਅਾਰਾ ਮਨਮੁਖ
translation: Five creatures and manmukh

gurmukhi: ਗਜ ਮ੍ਰਿਗ ਮੀਨ ਪਤੰਗ ਅਲਿ ੲਿਕਤੁ ੲਿਕਤੁ ਰੋਗਿ ਪਚੰਦੇ
transliteration: Gaj Mrig Meen Patang Ali Ikatu Ikatu Rogi Pachanday.
translation: Elephant, deer, fish, moth and black bee have one disease each, namely,  attraction for lust, sound, enjoyment, beautiful appearance and fragrance  respectively, and they are consumed by them.

gurmukhi: ਮਾਣਸ ਦੇਹੀ ਪੰਜਿ ਰੋਗ ਪੰਜੇ ਦੂਤ ਕੁਸੂਤੁ ਕਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Maanas Dayhee Panji Rog Panjay Doot Kousoot Karanday.
translation: But the man has all the five  ailments and these five always create turbulences in his life.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਸਾ ਮਨਸਾ ਡਾੲਿਣੀ ਹਰਖ ਸੋਗ ਬਹੁ ਰੋਗ ਵਧੰਦੇ
transliteration: Aasaa Manasaa Daainee Harakh Sog Bahu Rog Vadhanday.
translation: The witches  in the form of hope and desires and the happiness and sorrows further  aggravate the diseases.

gurmukhi: ਮਨਮੁਖ ਦੂਜੈ ਭਾੲਿ ਲਗਿ ਭੰਭਲਭੂਸੇ ਖਾੲਿ ਭਵੰਦੇ
transliteration: Manamoukh Doojay Bhaai Lagi Bhanbhalabhoosay Khaai Bhavanday.
translation: Controlled by dualism, the deluded manmukh runs  here and there.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਚਾ ਪਾਤਸਾਹ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਗਾਡੀ ਰਾਹੁ ਚਲੰਦੇ
transliteration: Satigur Sachaa Paatasaah Guramoukhi Gaadee Raahu Chaladay.
translation: The true Guru is the true king and the gurmukhs move on  the highway pointed out by Him.

gurmukhi: ਸਾਧ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਚਲਣਾ ਭਜ ਗੲੇ ਠਗ ਚੋਰ ਡਰੰਦੇ
transliteration: Saadh Sangati Mili Chalanaa Bhaji Gaay Tdag Chor Daranday.
translation: Moving along with and in the holy  congregation,

gurmukhi: ਲੈ ਲਾਹਾ ਨਿਜਿ ਘਰਿ ਨਿਬਹੰਦੇ ||੨੦||
transliteration: Lai Laahaa Niji Ghari Nibahanday ?20?
translation: the theives and cheats in the form of lust for materials run  away.

gurmukhi: ੨੧ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸੱਚਾ ਪਾਤਸ਼ਾਹ
translation: Guru,the true emperor

gurmukhi: ਬੇੜੀ ਚਾੜਿ ਲੰਘਾੲਿਦਾ ਬਾਹਲੇ ਪੂਰ ਮਾਣਸ ਮੋਹਾਣਾ
transliteration: Bayrhee Chaarhi Laghaaidaa Baahalay Poor Maanas Mohaanaa.
translation: Only one person ferries across many a man.

gurmukhi: ਅਾਗੂ ੲਿਕ ਨਿਬਾਹਿਦਾ ਲਸਕਰ ਸੰਗ ਸਾਹ ਸੁਲਤਾਣਾ
transliteration: Aagoo Iku Nibaahidaa Lasakar Sang Saah Sulataanaa.
translation: The one commander of the  imperial army gets the whole task executed.

gurmukhi: ਫਿਰੈ ਮਹਲੈ ਪਾਹਰੂ ਹੋੲਿ ਨਿਚਿੰਦ ਸਵਨਿ ਪਰਧਾਣਾ
transliteration: Dhirai Mahalai Paaharoo Hoi Nichind Savani Paradhaanaa.
translation: Because of only one  watchman in the locality, all the rich persons sleep free from any  anxiety.

gurmukhi: ਲਾੜਾ ੲਿਕ ਵਿਵਾਹੀਅੈ ਬਾਹਲੇ ਜਾਞਞਞਞੀਂ ਕਰਿ ਮਿਹਮਾਣਾ
transliteration: Laarhaa Iku Veevaaheeai Baahalay Jaaeen Kari Mihamaanaa.
translation: Guests in the marriage party remain many but the marriage is solemnised  of one person.

gurmukhi: ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ੲਿਕੁ ਮੁਲਕ ਵਿਚਿ ਹੋਰੁ ਪ੍ਰਜਾ ਹਿੰਦੂ ਮੁਸਲਮਾਣਾ
transliteration: Paatisaahu Iku Mulak Vichi Horu Prajaa Hindoo Mousalamaanaa.
translation: The emperor in the country happens to be one and the rest  are the public in the forms of Hindus and Muslims.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰੁ ਸਚਾ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਨੀਸਾਣਾ
transliteration: Satiguru Sachaa Paatisaahu Saadhasangati Guru Sabadu Neesaanaa.
translation: Similarly the true  Guru Emperor is one and the holy congregation and the Guru word-sabad  are His identification marks.

gurmukhi: ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪਰਣੈ ਤਿਨ ਕੁਰਬਾਣਾ ||੨੧||੫||
transliteration: Satigur Paranai Tin Kurabaanaa ?21?5?
translation: I sacrifice myself unto them who seek the  shelter of the true Guru.

gurmukhi: ਬ੍ਹਮਾਸਨ ਬਿਸ੍ਰਾਮ ਗੁਰ ਭੲੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੰਧਿ ਮਿਲਿ
transliteration: Brahamaasan Bisraama , Gur Bhaay Gurmukhi Sandhi Mili ?
translation: Satguru who resides in Waheguru (Brahm), meeting such Guru-conscious person (Guru Amar Das), and becoming one with him he too acquired all traits of Guru.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਰਮਤਾ ਰਾਮ ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਭੲੇ ||੧||੫||
transliteration: Gurmukhi Ramataa Raama , Raam Naam Gurmukhi Bhaay ?1?5?
translation: Through the blessings of Naam Simran of the principal Guru Satguru (Amar Das Ji), Guru Ram Das Ji too became prime Guru.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ਭੲੇ ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸੰਧ ਮਿਲਿ ਬ੍ਹਮਾਸਨ ਬਿਸ੍ਰਾਮ
transliteration: Gur Bhaay Gursikh Sandh Mili , Brahamaasan Bisraam ?
translation: In the association of prime Guru (Guru Amar Das Ji) he too became Guru and found refuge in the holy feet of the Lord.

gurmukhi: ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਭੲੇ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਰਮਤਾ ਰਾਮ ||੨||੫||
transliteration: Raam Naam Gurmukhi Bhaay , Gurmukhi Ramataa Raam ?2?5?
translation: The Guru-conscious person whose name is Ram Das, by perpetual meditation on Lord's name, became Guru-oriented and virtuous (Satguru)

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਰਮਤਾ ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪ੍ਰਗਟਾੲਿਓ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Ramataa Raama , Naam Gurmukhi Pragataaiao ?
translation: Through God-conscious Guru Amar Das Ji and by the blessing of meditation on His name, the virtuous Ram Das emerged as Guru Ram Das (slave of the Lord).

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਗੁਰੁ ਗਿਅਾਨ ਧਿਅਾਨ ਗੁਰ ਗੁਰੂ ਕਹਾੲਿਓ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Guru Giaana , Dhiaan Gur Guru Kahaaiao ?
translation: Because of knowledge of Guru Shabad and consciously uniting with Him, Guru Ram Das became known as principal Guru.

gurmukhi: ਦੀਪ ਜੋਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਦੀਪ ਜੋਤਿ ਜਗਮਗ ਅੰਤਰਿ ੳੁਰ
transliteration: Deep Joti Mili Deepa , Joti Jagamag Antari Ur ?
translation: The flame of a beacon lights up another lamp.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਰਮਤਾ ਰਾਮ ਸੰਧ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਭੲੇ ਗੁਰ ||੩||੫||
transliteration: Gurmukhi Ramataa Raama , Sandh Gurmukhi Mili Bhaay Gur ?3?5?
translation: Thus Guru Ram Das became principal Guru through the blessings of Simran of Lord's name and his association with Guru Amar Das Ji. (5)
